scripts.dev: npm run start:dev --workspace=backend & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.build: rm -f .logs/*build.log && (npm run build --workspace=backend > .logs/backend-build.log 2>&1 & npm run build --workspace=frontend > .logs/frontend-build.log 2>&1 & npm run build --workspace=cli > .logs/cli-build.log 2>&1; wait) && echo 'Build complete - see .logs/ for details' || echo 'Build failures found - see .logs/ for details'
scripts.lint: rm -f .logs/*lint.log && (npm run lint --workspace=backend > .logs/backend-lint.log 2>&1 & npm run lint --workspace=frontend > .logs/frontend-lint.log 2>&1 & npm run lint --workspace=cli > .logs/cli-lint.log 2>&1; wait) && echo 'Lint checks complete - see .logs/ for details' || echo 'Lint errors found - see .logs/ for details'
scripts.test: rm -f .logs/*test.log && (npm run test --workspace=backend > .logs/backend-test.log 2>&1 & npm run test --workspace=frontend > .logs/frontend-test.log 2>&1 & npm run test --workspace=cli > .logs/cli-test.log 2>&1; wait) && echo 'Tests complete - see .logs/ for details' || echo 'Test failures found - see .logs/ for details'
scripts.typecheck: rm -f .logs/*typecheck.log && (npm run typecheck --workspace=backend > .logs/backend-typecheck.log 2>&1 & npm run typecheck --workspace=frontend > .logs/frontend-typecheck.log 2>&1 & npm run typecheck --workspace=cli > .logs/cli-typecheck.log 2>&1; wait) && echo 'Typecheck complete - see .logs/ for details' || echo 'Type errors found - see .logs/ for details'
scripts.ci: cd /home/swansonj/projects/USAsset3/ && rm -rf .logs/*.log && echo '🔍 Running lint...' && npm run lint && echo '🔧 Running typecheck...' && npm run typecheck && echo '🧪 Running tests...' && npm run test && echo '🏗️  Running build...' && npm run build && npm run ci:summary
scripts.sync: npm run ci && git add . && node .claude/sync.js && git push
scripts.clean: echo '🗑️  Cleaning node_modules directories...' && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && echo '🗑️  Cleaning package-lock.json files...' && find . -name 'package-lock.json' -delete 2>/dev/null || true && echo '📦 Reinstalling dependencies...' && npm install && echo '✅ Clean complete!'
